Question: Loonkow Technology(Shenzhen) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Loonkow Technology(Shenzhen) Co., Ltd

Wireless Charging Products

- Magnetic wireless charging for watches, stands, and car mounts
- OEM/ODM services with design patents
- Strict compliance with WPC qi standards and safety certifications
- R&D, design, manufacturing, and sales of wireless chargers and consumer electronics
- Daily production capacity of 15,000 units
- Focus on automotive wireless charging products
- Innovative wireless locating anti-loss device
- VR factory viewing experience
- Compact and sleek design for convenience and portability
- Fast charging capability
- Coiled wireless chargers for folding phones
- Emphasis on product durability and quality
- Collaboration with clients for strategic roadmaps and milestones

Contact: +86 159 8945 2958
Location: 6th Floor, C Building, Huamingcheng High-Tech Park, Shenzhen, China
